Package exceptions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExceptionHandler
    This is a handler that checks for empty fields.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExceptionHandler.FIELD
    Enums for the types of empty fields
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClaimPermissionException
    This will occur when a user attempts access an invalid method
    DuplicateException
    This Exception will occur when there is duplicate data
    EmptyFieldException
    This Exception will occur when there is empty fields
    EmptyListException
    This Exception will occur when there is an empty list being manipulated
    InvalidDateException
    This Exception will occur when a date is not valid
    InvalidFieldEntryException
    This will occur when a method accesses the wrong field
    InvalidFieldException
    This will occur when there is an invalid field being used
    InvalidNameException
    This will occur when a user name is invalid
    InvalidUserPermissionException
    This will occur when a user attempts access an invalid method
